education.institution: Quaid-e-Awam University of Engineering, Science & Technology, Nawabshah, PK

highlights: Provided Tier II Technical Support.
IT Service Management using IBM Control Desk.
Systems Life cycle and Patch Management using IBM Bigfix.
Infrastructure Deployment that included networks, Data Centre & End User Devices.
Deployment of DR site using Veeam and IBM Storages
Deployment of Network Monitoring System (Observium).
Allocating resources and new VM creation in Cloud.
Reporting using IBM Bigfix, Observium and TrendMicro.
Provided Tier I and Tier II Technical Support.
Basic System Administration I.e. Managing Computers and Users, Create Active Directory Accounts, managing groups and assigning Office 365 licenses.
Management of Enterprise IT infrastructure using HP Enterprise Service Manager i.e. Ticketing System.
Installing and configuring desktop/laptop, operating systems, troubleshoot networks.
Installation and troubleshooting of standard enterprise software applications (i.e. Oracle E-Business Suite and Siebel etc.).
Troubleshoot various network issues affect solutions and collaborate with network team and outside vendors to resolve complex issues.
Managing Cisco Videocon devices.
Managing IT Asset of SSC3 – Veon.
Coordination with different vendor’s over telephone, meetings and emails regarding the hardware issues faced by the users.
Provided Technical Support to different School Branches.
Troubleshooting of network related issue.
Monitoring the School Management System.
Installation and Configuration of IT assets.

work.summary: Worked on SAP ECC 6.0 and took overview of its different modules.
